means: 茅膏菜属植物（能捕捉昆虫）

PerfectNetExp.abs: 茅膏菜属茅膏菜属（Drosera）内有超过100种茅膏菜具有可运动的黏液捕虫器。黏液腺存在于黏液腺柄的末端。

derivation.yuyuan_name: modern Latin, from Greek droseros 'dewy' (from the appearance of the glistening hairs on the leaves)

means.word_mean: 1. the type genus of Droseraceae including many low bog-inhabiting insectivorous plants

auth_sentence.content: The findings are based on tests on the round-leaved sundew plant, drosera rotundifolia.
